title: Saving Before Spending â€“ A Hard Lesson
content: Ravi ki zindagi us din badli jab use apni pehli naukri mili. Har mahine jab paise aate, use lagta tha ab thoda khud ke liye jeena chahiye. Online offers, chhoti outings aur random shopping uske liye ek normal cheez ban chuki thi.

Ravi kabhi bhi pehle se plan nahi karta tha. Uska sochna tha ki jo mahine ke end me bachega, wahi kaafi hai. Par aksar mahina khatam hone se pehle hi balance kam ho jata. Phir bhi use lagta tha ki ye sab temporary hai.

Ek din ghar se phone aaya. Ek achanak zarurat ke liye turant madad chahiye thi. Ravi ne apna account dekha aur pehli baar use thoda uneasy feel hua. Paisa tha, par utna nahi jitna us waqt kaam aa sakta.

Us raat Ravi ne khud se koi wada nahi kiya, bas ek simple decision liya. Agli baar jab paise aaye, usne bina zyada soche ek chhota hissa alag rakh diya. Baaki kharch pehle jaisa hi raha, bas thoda soch ke.
Kuch samay baad Ravi ne mehsoos kiya ki uski life me zyada kuch badla nahi, par uska confidence badh gaya tha. Ab agar koi unexpected situation hoti, to use ghabrahat nahi hoti.
Ravi ko samajh aa gaya tha ki sab kuch control karna zaroori nahi hota. Kabhi-kabhi bas thoda pehle soch lena hi kaafi hota hai.
